flawed_nl_solution:
The necklace stand needs another 12 – 5 = <<12-5=7>>7 necklaces.
This will cost the store 7 * 4 = $<<7*4=28>>28.
The ring display needs another 30 – 18 = <<30-18=13>>13 rings.
This will cost the store 13 * 10 = $<<13*10=130>>130.
The bracelet display needs another 15 – 8 = <<15-8=7>>7 bracelets.
This will cost the store 7 * 5 = $<<7*5=35>>35.
In total, the store needs to pay 28 + 130 +35 = $<<28+130+35=193>>193.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
